metadata.title: Alpen Tesitin Hotel Panorama Resort - Dolomites 5 Star
metadata.description: Alpen Tesitin: Exclusive 5-star luxury hotel in the heart of the Dolomites. Experience unparalleled alpine elegance with panoramic suites, gourmet dining, and a world-class wellness spa.
metadata.keywords: hotel booking,Italian Alps,Dolomites,South Tyrol,5-star hotel,alpine luxury,panoramic suites,wellness hotel,luxury spa,gourmet restaurant,Alpen Tesitin,wellness treatments,beauty center,hair salon,car rental,fitness gym,Finnish sauna,Turkish bath,special offers,vacation packages,Dolomites weather,mountain weather forecast,guided hikes,winter ski vacation
metadata.author: Alpen Tesitin
metadata.ogImageAlt: Alpen Tesitin Hotel - Luxury 5-star hotel with panoramic views of the Dolomites

HomePage.main_title: Alpen Tesitin – your dream 5-star hotel in Val Pusteria/Pustertal
HomePage.main_description: Our hotel in Val Pusteria/Pustertal, the Alpen Tesitin, is an insider tip if you're looking for something that bit special. For rest and comfort. For wellness and experiences in South Tyrol. Right before your eyes tower the awe-inspiring peaks of the Dolomites that dominate the view and whisk you away into a world of unrivalled beauty. Trees, open space, mountains, and sunshine outside. A harmonious feel-good ambience and luxurious comfort inside. Plus a close-knit team that intuitively grants your every wish. And a holiday that will stay in your heart forever.
HomePage.wellness_text: A world of spacious pools and soothing saunas, with beauty area, hair salon, and gym, awaits you at our hotel in Welsberg, Taisten.
HomePage.offers_subtitle: Are you longing for a romantic couple's weekend, an adventure-filled family holiday, or simply a getaway amidst nature? Our wide variety of offers will put a smile on everyone's face.
HomePage.testimonial_text: Your hotel is one of the best places we have visited. The place, your staff, your spa, and your meals, all was perfect.
HomePage.holiday_title: A holiday at the Alpen Tesitin - the heights of joy
HomePage.holiday_text: Here where majestic peaks touch the sky and nature flourishes in its purest form, holiday bliss awaits.
HomePage.experiences_text: Here with us, the world's largest ski carousel and the legendary hiking trails of the Dolomites await you alongside solitary paths through snowy nature and thrilling bike routes to flower-filled Alpine meadows.
HomePage.slide1_desc: Enjoy the endless expanse of the infinity pool and let the water carry you as you admire the breathtaking scenery in the morning light.
HomePage.slide2_desc: A symphony of fragrant espresso and creamy cappuccino plus crispy bread from the organic bakery, honey from the beekeeper in Taisten, fluffy waffles, the finest ham, and much more besides. Served on our hotel terrace in summer.
HomePage.slide3_desc: A rowing boat trip on Lake Braies/Pragser Wildsee, skiing at Mt Plan de Corones/Kronplatz, hiking in the Dolomites UNESCO World Heritage, or cross-country skiing in the winter peace of Val Casies/Gsieser Tal – no matter the season, there's so much to love in Alta Pusteria/Hochpustertal.
HomePage.slide4_desc: Choose from fresh salads, fine antipasti, and tasty soups as well as homemade cakes and treats from the AT patisserie.
HomePage.slide5_desc: Mercedes, Porsche, or Lamborghini: Discover pure freedom on the pass roads in the Dolomites with our luxury car rental.
HomePage.slide6_desc: Natural luxury is at your fingertips in our wellness world. Spacious pool areas, cosy sauna oases, and pampering treatments invite you to linger and dream.
HomePage.slide7_desc: Settle in amidst the natural beauty of our hotel terrace, surrounded by majestic mountain peaks. Here, immersed in this glorious setting, an aperitif becomes an experience for all the senses.
HomePage.slide8_desc: The highlight of the day: an exquisite 5- to 7-course gourmet menu that takes you on a culinary journey through the aromas of South Tyrol and Italy.
HomePage.slide9_desc: Enjoy our selection of excellent drinks while thinking back on the day's adventures. In our bar, you'll always find the right atmosphere to make new memories.
HomePage.slide10_desc: Fall into the embrace of our lovely rooms and suites and treat yourself to some well-earned relaxation after an exciting day. Welcome to your personal oasis of well-being.

wellness.title: Wellness
wellness.description: A world of<link> spacious pools</link> and soothing saunas, with beauty area, hair salon, and gym, awaits you at our hotel in Welsberg, Taisten.

architecture.title: Architecture
architecture.description: Experience Alpine flair with a new twist: Styled with floor-to-ceiling glazing and a contemporary design, the Alpen Tesitin offers luxurious comfort in an ultramodern ambience.

cuisine.title: Cuisine
cuisine.description: At our hotel in Val Pusteria/Pustertal, cuisine is transformed into an authentic experience. Because we're passionate about showing you the unique variety of South Tyrolean cuisine.

panoramicLocation.title: Panoramic location
panoramicLocation.description: Above Taisten, one of South Tyrol's "sun villages", amidst unspoilt meadows and dense forests, the Alpen Tesitin enjoys unrestricted views of the Dolomites UNESCO World Heritage.

experiences.title: Experiences
experiences.description: Here with us, the world's largest ski carousel and the legendary hiking trails of the Dolomites await you alongside solitary paths through snowy nature and thrilling bike routes to flower-filled Alpine meadows.

carRental.title: Car rental
carRental.description: Whether in a Porsche or Lamborghini – with its scenic mountain roads and legendary Dolomites passes, Val Pusteria/Pustertal offers a unique setting for unforgettable driving experiences.

vouchers.title: Vouchers
vouchers.description: Treat your loved ones to moments that touch the heart in one of the most beautiful places in South Tyrol. The Alpen Tesitin, your hotel in Val Pusteria/Pustertal, awaits!

impressions.title: Impressions
impressions.description: Click your way through our world of majestic Dolomites peaks and luxurious 5-star amenities – a sense of wonder is guaranteed!

CarRentalPage.title: Car rental at the Alpen Tesitin
CarRentalPage.description: Whether you travel without your car or want to feel pure freedom on the pass roads of the Dolomites, reserve the car of your dreams with us at the Alpen Tesitin and collect unforgettable driving experiences.
CarRentalPage.note: Please note: Car rental is exclusively available to guests staying at the Alpen Tesitin.

vwPolo.title: AT VW Polo
vwPolo.description: VW Polo with manual transmission, liability insurance and will be handed over full to full. 1 day €45. From 5 days €35 per day

bmwIx.title: BMW iX 60
bmwIx.description: BMW iX 60 (fully electric) with a range of 701 km, 544 hp, automatic transmission, and all-wheel drive. Fully comprehensive insurance with a €1,000 deductible. Free charging at the hotel. 1 day: €95. From 5 days: €85 per day

mercedesG500.title: Mercedes-Benz G 500
mercedesG500.description: Mercedes-Benz G 500 with automatic transmission and all-wheel drive has fully comprehensive insurance with an excess of €2,000 and will be handed over full to full. 1 day €380. From 5 days €320 per day

porsche911.title: Porsche 911 Carrera 4 GTS (992)
porsche911.intro: Experience dream days in the Dolomites with dream cabriolets. Required: A minimum age of 30 years and a valid driving licence held for at least 10 years.
porsche911.petrol: Petrol full to full (98 or 100 octane – Super Plus)

mercedesAMG.title: Mercedes-Benz AMG GTC
mercedesAMG.intro: Savour the concentrated power of the Mercedes-Benz AMG GTC as you soar elegantly around the corners while conquering the roads of Val Pusteria/Pustertal. Required: A minimum age of 30 years and a valid driving licence held for at least 10 years.
mercedesAMG.petrol: Petrol full to full (98 or 100 octane – Super Plus)

lamborghini.title: Lamborghini Huracan Evo Spyder
lamborghini.intro: Experience dream days in the Dolomites with dream cabriolets. Required: Sports-car experience, a minimum age of 40 years and a valid driving licence held for at least 10 years.
lamborghini.petrol: Petrol full to full (100 octane – Super Plus)

responsibility.title: Driving pleasure with responsibility
responsibility.quote: For every cabriolet drive, we plant new trees to offset CO2 emissions. That way, not only do unforgettable journeys remain, but also a sustainable contribution to nature.
responsibility.signature: Familie Feichter and the AT Team

voucher.title: Say it with a voucher
voucher.subtitle: … for sports-car lovers, open-top enthusiasts, and everyone who wants to experience driving thrills.
voucher.description: You can buy vouchers for our car rental directly with us at the hotel. Please note that it is only possible to redeem these in conjunction with a hotel stay. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at any time.

LivePage.heroTitle: Our luxury hotel in South Tyrol with 5-star services
LivePage.intro: You'll find an abundance of <link>inclusive services</link> at the Alpen Tesitin. To whet your appetite for your holiday, here's a quick peek of all the luxury here of our hotel in South Tyrol.

services.item1: Indulgent breakfast buffet from 7:15 a.m. to 11 a.m.
services.item2: <link>Lunch and afternoon buffet:</link> fresh and different every day, always prepared with love
services.item3: Gourmet dinner with 5- to 7-course gourmet menu
services.item4: 10 guided hikes or 6 guided snowshoe hikes per week. Explore the nature of Val Pusteria/Pustertal in both summer and winter.
services.item5: 3 guided ski days per week in winter
services.item6: 12 relaxation sessions per week with morning exercises, water aerobics, yoga, back relaxation, stretching, legs, abs, and glutes training, and much more
services.item7: Guest Pass: special conditions for participation in events and hikes organised by the tourist association; free use of public transport
services.item8: Fun in the water: indoor pool (33°C) and outdoor pool (34°C) plus outdoor sun infinity pool (20x9m) with wow factor, 180° dream view, and a water temperature of 32°C
services.item9: Spacious sauna area with phenomenal view of the Dolomites UNESCO World Heritage

family.title: Are you travelling with your family?
family.text: From spacious family rooms to child-friendly activities and services, we make sure you feel right at home in our luxury hotel in South Tyrol and can enjoy your stay to the fullest. During the day, you can explore the surroundings together, splash in the pool, or hit the ski slopes or bike trails. Because one thing is guaranteed: Family is at the heart of everything we do here, and we go above and beyond to transform your stay into an unforgettable experience for all ages.

adventures.title: Adventures that transform into memories
adventures.text: Whether you'll be scaling the peaks, hiking through flower-filled meadows, or simply enjoying the tranquillity of nature, our luxury hotel in South Tyrol offers you the ideal starting point for unforgettable experiences in our unique mountain world.

LivePage.holidayMagic:
Holiday magic is in the air
at our luxury hotel in Val Pusteria/Pustertal

InclusiveServicesPage.heroTitle: Our inclusive services – to make your holiday second-to-none
InclusiveServicesPage.heroDescription:
The majestic view of the Prags Dolomites. The wondrously clear mountain air. The relaxingly friendly ambience. Your holiday at the Alpen Tesitin? Dedicated to refreshment, inner balance, and joie de vivre.

What else awaits you? Sweet idleness. Romance. A mouth-watering cocktail to sip while thinking back on a fantastic day and looking forward to an evening of culinary indulgence. Plus our fine inclusive services. For a holiday experience that's perfect in every respect.

cuisine.title: Cuisine: indulgence³
cuisine.intro: Enjoy the finer things in life on your holiday in Val Pusteria/Pustertal with our ¾ course gourmet board.

breakfast.title: Indulgent breakfast buffet from 7.15 a.m. to 11 a.m.

items.item1: We serve you fragrant espresso and creamy cappuccino to help you wake up. You can also look forward to crispy bread from the organic bakery, brioche that's still warm from the oven, delicious cakes from our in-house patisserie, fine ham from South Tyrol and other areas of Italy, flavoursome cheeses, organic egg dishes prepared to order, homemade spreads and honey from a beekeeper in Taisten, fruity juices and smoothies, fluffy waffles, and much, much more. Pure breakfast indulgence!
items.item2: You can also order breakfast to be delivered to your room at any time through room service (for an additional fee).

lunch.title: Lunch and afternoon buffet: fresh and different every day, always prepared with love

items.item1: 12.30 p.m. to 2 p.m.: warm lunch dish from the show kitchen
items.item2: 12.30 p.m. to 4.30 p.m.: Afternoon buffet with fresh salads and fine antipasti, tasty soups and crispy bread from the organic bakery, homemade cakes and treats from the AT patisserie
items.item3: From 12.30 p.m.: Delicious fruit, vegetable sticks with dips, dried fruit and nuts, as well as a variety of teas and juices from our wellness bar
items.item4: 12.00 p.m. to 2 p.m.: exquisite à-la-carte lunch in our restaurant (for an additional fee).

dinner.title: Gourmet dinner with gourmet menu from 6.45 p.m. to 8.45 p.m.

items.item1: In the evening, our kitchen team pampers you with a 5- to 7-course gourmet menu. Embark on a culinary voyage through South Tyrol and the rest of Italy. You're also welcome to select your dinner from the à la carte menu. Aperitifs, speciality evenings, dessert buffets with sweet temptations, an exquisite gala dinner, and highlights from the show kitchen round off your gourmet experience.

indulgence.title: Culinary indulgence from morning til night

items.item1: 24-hour menu: We're delighted to pamper you with the finest à la carte dishes around the clock (for an additional fee).
items.item2: Our sommeliers Gerold and Max passionately guide you through our world of wine with 365 labels.
items.item3: The AT wine bunker with view of the awe-inspiring mountains is an impressive setting for the twice-weekly wine tastings (for an additional fee).

activities.title: Activities: active experiences
activities.intro: Discover the most stunning spots in the Dolomites and explore the fascinating nature around your holiday hideaway.

items.item1: 10 guided hikes, mountain tours, and adventurous excursions per week
items.item3: Rental of gravel bikes with helmet (for an additional fee)
items.item4: Rental of fully e-bikes including helmet (for an additional fee)
items.item5: Two-wheeled dolce vita: Vespa rental including helmet (for an additional fee)

items.item2: 3 guided ski days per week: Discover the best ski areas in the Dolomites.
items.item3: Our complimentary AT ski shuttles transport you to South Tyrol's number 1 ski area, Mt Plan de Corones/Kronplatz, in just 14 minutes

items.item1: 12 relaxation sessions per week with morning exercises, water aerobics, yoga, back relaxation, stretching, legs, abs, and glutes training, and much more
items.item2: Light-flooded, 140m² gym with captivating view of the Dolomites
items.item3: Individual support from a personal trainer in the gym (for an additional fee)
items.item5: Guest Pass: Special conditions for participation in events and hikes organised by the tourist association and free use of public transport (excluded: shuttle to Prato Piazza/Plätzwiese high plateau and Rifugio Auronzo and transport of dogs and bikes)
items.item6: Complimentary rental: hiking and Nordic walking poles, backpacks, water bottles, hiking maps, snowshoes, and much more
items.item7: Mountain corner: Mountain corner with hiking recommendations, maps, and much more
items.item8: You'll receive all photos taken by our hiking guide during the hikes by WeTransfer in the original size (alternative: USB stick for €5).

wellness.title: Wellness: relax and enjoy
wellness.intro: Pause for a moment. Listen to your own thoughts. Discover the joy of slowing down. And look forward to relaxing inclusive services.

items.item1: Spa bag, fluffy bathrobes, and soft AT slippers
items.item2: Indoor pool (33°C) and outdoor pool (34°C) with unique view of the Dolomites for lovers of the finer things in life
items.item3: Peak swimming bliss: outdoor sun infinity pool (20x9m) with wow factor, 180° dream view, and a water temperature of 32°C
items.item4: Luxury infinity whirlpool (8x5m) with stunning view of the Dolomites and 36°C warm water; open to guests aged 16 and up
items.item5: Infinity brine relax pool (8x5m) with salt water to drift and relax in at 36°C; nude area – open to guests aged 16 and up
items.item6: Plunge pool (8x3m) with 14°C fresh mountain spring water; nude area – open to guests aged 16 and up
items.item7: Our sauna world: infusion experience sauna, panoramic Finnish sauna, sauna made of kelo wood, bio-soft herbal sauna made of Swiss-pine wood, crystal aroma steam bath, brine steam bath, and infrared loungers; nude area – open to guests aged 16 and up
items.item8: Bio-soft sauna and aroma steam bath in the clothed area around the swimming pool
items.item9: 12 excellently trained spa employees for treatments and massages
items.item10: Panoramic sunbathing lawn with comfortable loungers, swings, and cosy nests (in summer)
items.item11: In the sauna garden: sunbathing lawn featuring swings and loungers with mountain views (in summer, open to guests aged 16 and up)
items.item12: Cosy niches and water beds in lovely panoramic relaxation rooms
items.item14: Wellness bar with fresh fruit and vegetable sticks with dips, dried fruits and nuts, as well as spring water, teas, and juices
items.item15: Three sauna infusion events per day with varying themes
items.item16: Daily herbal peels in the crystal aroma steam bath
items.item17: Romantic firepit in the sauna garden (in winter)

kids.title: Our services for kids and teens
kids.intro: There's also plenty to keep kids and teens happy on your holiday in Val Pusteria/Pustertal.

items.item1: Fluffy bathrobes and AT slippers in children's and teenagers' sizes
items.item2: Children's and teens' room with lots of highlights (chill-out corner, climbing wall, Lamborghini driving simulator, foosball, soft Lego, Fun4Four games table, and much more)
items.item3: Fun in the water: Indoor pool (33°C) and outdoor pool (34°C) plus outdoor sun infinity pool (20x9m) with wow factor, 180° dream view, and a water temperature of 32°C
items.item4: Bio-soft sauna and aroma steam bath in the clothed area around the swimming pool
items.item5: Available to borrow when arranged in advance: kettle in your room, highchairs, cot, baby monitor, stroller, baby carrier for hiking
items.item6: A selection of delicious kids' dishes

RelaxPage.heroTitle: Your spa hotel in Val Pusteria/Pustertal with Dolomites views
RelaxPage.heroDescription: The Dolomites within reach, luxuriant nature just outside your window – in our spa hotel in Val Pusteria/Pustertal, you'll experience wellness in a setting that makes your heart skip a beat. During a dip in the indoor or outdoor pool, you'll be immersed in the awe-inspiring mountain panorama reflected in the crystal-clear water as your gaze drifts over the majestic peaks before you. The magic of the Dolomites even accompanies you in the heat of the sauna or while working up a sweat in the gym and exercise room. And as we pamper you in our treatment rooms, you'll be embraced by the beauty of nature and immersed in peace and comfort.
RelaxPage.spaTitle:
A spa & sport hotel in Val Pusteria/Pustertal
that revives your senses

warmth.title: Embraced by warmth
warmth.description: Soothing herbal scents lead you through the spacious sauna area of our spa hotel in Val Pusteria/Pustertal. Just follow your nose, but keep your eyes open, too, because the view from our eight saunas and steam baths is simply stunning!

water.title: Surrounded by water
water.description: All tension falls away in the year-round heated indoor and outdoor pool of our spa hotel in Val Pusteria/Pustertal, while a session in the bubbling whirlpool will leave you feeling reborn.

pampered.title: Pampered by pros
pampered.text: Savour the feeling of lightness and find a new zest for life thanks to the power of nature – in both winter and summer. The rich selection of massages and treatments at our spa hotel in Val Pusteria/Pustertal reflects the variety of South Tyrol and lets you find the treatment method that perfectly suits you and your needs. Our hair expert will also enhance your natural beauty with a new cut or a trendy hairstyle – for a special occasion or just because.

revitalised.title: Revitalised by freshness
revitalised.text: It's well worth paying a visit to the spa bar. Fresh fruit and vegetable sticks with dips, dried fruit, spring water, teas, and juices are wonderfully refreshing – and it's a great place to stop for a friendly chat, too.

activeHotel.title: Looking for an active hotel in South Tyrol?
activeHotel.description: If you're fascinated by the Dolomites, you'll absolutely love our gym and exercise room with view of the Pale Mountains. It's open from 7 a.m. to 10 p.m. – with professional guidance if you wish. Relaxation and fitness sessions such as yoga and stretching also regularly take place.

PoolPage.heroTitle: Aquatic refreshment at our hotel in Val Pusteria/Pustertal with pool
PoolPage.heroDescription: Gentle water, mesmerising peace, and enchanting views – the water world of our hotel in Val Pusteria/Pustertal with pool is a place of magical relaxation. Whether you're drifting in the refreshing water or soaking up the sun on a poolside lounger.

infinityPool.title: Highlight: sun infinity pool in Val Pusteria/Pustertal
infinityPool.text: Swim on top of the world in our sun infinity pool. The interplay of crystal-clear water heated to 32°C and glorious views creates a magical atmosphere that invites you to leave everyday stress behind and surrender heart and soul to the moment. Our hotel with heated outdoor pool in South Tyrol promises wow moments and a dream 180° view.

indoorPool.title: Panoramic indoor pool
indoorPool.text: Surrounded by floor-to-ceiling windows that open up an enchanting view of the majestic Dolomites, at our hotel in Val Pusteria/Pustertal with pool, you can take a dip while soaking up the beauty of nature. Or you can glide through the passthrough out into the outdoor pool – 26 metres long and heated to a pleasant temperature of 34°C all year round.

brinePool.title: Infinity brine relax pool
brinePool.text:
The warm brine softly caresses your skin and helps release all traces of tension. This pool will conquer your heart with its unique design and infinite views. In summer, you can then make yourself comfortable on the outdoor loungers, while warmth and tranquillity await you indoors in winter.

Please note that the infinity brine relax pool is a nude area. Only open to guests aged 16 and up.

whirlpool.title: Luxury infinity whirlpool
whirlpool.text:
Whether you're enjoying some relaxing me time or sharing the whirlpool with friends or your partner, this luxurious retreat with stunning Dolomites panorama offers you an unforgettable wellness experience. Let the bubbling water jets pamper you and experience a 36°C bathing experience that you won't forget in a hurry.

Only open to guests aged 16 and up.

plungePool.title: Plunge pool
plungePool.text:
After a sauna session or hot shower at our hotel in Val Pusteria/Pustertal with pool, a quick dip in the plunge pool is a feel-good experience that stimulates your circulation and revitalises your body. The crisp 14°C mountain spring water makes you feel refreshed and revitalised.

Please note that the plunge pool is a nude area. Only open to guests aged 16 and up.

SaunaPage.heroTitle: Your hotel with sauna area in South Tyrol
SaunaPage.heroDescription: Every day from 12 noon to 7.30 p.m. at our hotel with sauna in South Tyrol, the door opens to a world of profound relaxation, where you can sit back in the soothing warmth and feel yourself filled with a renewed sense of buoyancy. It's a place where you'll not only enjoy the beneficial heat of our saunas, but also soak up phenomenal views of the Dolomites UNESCO World Heritage.

infusionSauna.title: Infusion experience sauna
infusionSauna.text: Our Finnish sauna in Val Pusteria/Pustertal, made of fine walnut wood, strengthens your immune system, trains your cardiovascular system, lowers blood pressure, cleanses your body, and relaxes your muscles. It also improves blood flow to the respiratory system and increases overall efficiency. Regular sauna sessions can prevent hyperacidity, slow skin ageing, and relieve headaches and migraines.

panoramicSauna.title: Panoramic infusion sauna made of antique wood
panoramicSauna.text: A sauna for everyone, including beginners, with a fantastic effect: It boosts the immune system, activates the body's defences, trains the cardiovascular system, relaxes the muscles, improves blood flow to mucous membranes, boosts performance … and has a view you'll fall in love with!

bioSauna.title: Bio-soft herbal sauna made from Swiss-pine wood
bioSauna.text: A gentle sauna for newbies and people with circulatory issues. The blend of herbs (marigold, lemon balm, peppermint) from the Alpen Tesitin garden and the stunning view into the distance work in tandem to help you relax.

finnishSauna.title: Finnish sauna made of kelo wood
finnishSauna.text: The dry heat of the Finnish sauna is a panacea for experienced sauna fans. It boosts the body's defences and the cardiovascular system, relaxes the muscles, and helps signs of ageing, headaches, and migraines.

crystalBath.title: Crystal bath
crystalBath.text: Here, the pores open up to let masks or peels penetrate deep into the lower layers of skin for even more effective nourishment. The immune system is also strengthened, the circulation is stimulated, and the airways are freed.

brineBath.title: Sorapis brine steam bath
brineBath.text: Enjoy the ideal combination of heat, salt, and humidity in the brine steam bath. It has a tension-relieving, cleansing, nurturing, and relaxing effect.

infraredLoungers.title: Infrared loungers
infraredLoungers.text: While you relax on the lounger, the radiated heat increases your body temperature from within. This helps you achieve a good sweat without putting strain on the body, meaning it's especially popular with people who are sensitive to heat.

steamBath.title: Clothed steam bath
steamBath.description: Especially gentle on the body, making it ideal for sauna newbies as well as children and teens. The high humidity helps with respiratory issues and has an antibacterial effect.

bioSauna.title: Clothed bio sauna
bioSauna.description: Fragrant herbs from our garden (marigold, lemon balm, peppermint) not only promote well-being, but also have a beneficial effect on mood, metabolism, and circulatory system.

havenSection.title: Peaceful havens that invite you to dream
havenSection.description: Wellness and the Dolomites are an extraordinary combination. Simply gaze out through the panoramic windows that await you in all four relaxation areas of our wellness hotel and you'll be filled with a unique sense of calmness and serenity. Cosy niches and water beds await you in the stunning panoramic relaxation room, and other small, lovely relaxation rooms also invite you to linger. In summer, when the sun is high in the sky, there's nothing better than soaking up the peace of nature on the spacious sunbathing lawn and snuggling up in the comfortable loungers, chairs, and cosy niches.

GymPage.heroTitle: Your wellness hotel with gym and view of the Dolomites
GymPage.heroDescription: At the heart of the majestic Dolomites, besides the awe-inspiring views, you'll also find our wellness hotel with gym, which is just waiting to exhilarate your senses and bring your fitness goals within reach. Treat yourself to a training session with a view and experience the power of nature inspiring you to new heights of performance - and then relax in our sublimely beautiful wellness world.
GymPage.gymHours:
Our gym:

open for you from 7 a.m. to 10 p.m. every day!

gymSection.title: What will it be today?
gymSection.description: Discover our gym with the latest equipment – or take part in our active programme. You can look forward to a varied range of activities every day, including morning exercises, yoga, healthy back training, stretching, legs, abs, and glutes training, and much more.

ExperiencePage.heroTitle: Your 5-star sport hotel in South Tyrol
ExperiencePage.heroDescription: The Alpen Tesitin, your sport hotel in South Tyrol, is your gateway to a bona fide paradise. Step inside and discover the endless magic of a world full of adventures and unforgettable natural experiences.

winter.title: Winter
winter.description: The crystal-clear mountain air, snow-bound Dolomites peaks, and thrilling ski runs of Mt Plan de Corones/Kronplatz, South Tyrol's no. 1 ski mountain – in winter, Val Pusteria/Pustertal exudes its own, special charm.

summer.title: Summer
summer.description: Summer lets you discover the intrinsic peace of nature and effortlessly escape the daily grind, surrounded by dense forests, wild meadows, and a majestic mountain panorama.

wonderDay.title: A day filled with wonder
wonderDay.text: Unparalleled adventures await you against the backdrop of the majestic Dolomites, legendary Mt Plan de Corones/Kronplatz, and the world-famous Three Peaks. No matter whether you explore nature while hiking, biking, or indulging or scale peaks with skis, cross-country skis, or snowshoes on your feet, you'll find an active paradise that's in a class of its own around our sport hotel in South Tyrol. Dive right in and marvel at the beauty of nature in Val Pusteria/Pustertal. Get ready to fall in love!

seasonsMagic.title: The magic of the seasons
seasonsMagic.text: Experience spring, when the Alpine meadows are bursting with colourful blooms. Enjoy summer, when the lush nature is caressed by a pleasant breeze. Admire autumn, when the views from the peaks reach impressively far. Or immerse yourself in winter, when Val Pusteria/Pustertal transforms into a snow-bound winter wonderland and snowflakes dance gently down from the sky. At the Alpen Tesitin, your sport hotel in South Tyrol, each season has its own, incomparable charm. Find out for yourself!

luxuryCar.title:
The sport hotel in Val Pusteria/Pustertal with
luxury cabriolet rental
luxuryCar.description: Unadulterated luxury on the majestic pass roads of the Dolomites. The wind in your hair, a feeling of freedom in your heart. Rent one of the luxury cabriolets at our sport hotel in South Tyrol and experience the unbridled power of nature while soaking up the beauty of our iconic routes. As the glorious scenery passes by and your horizons expand, you'll feel more alive than ever before.

topThree.title: Our Top 3
topThree.subtitle: at our active hotel in South Tyrol

items.item1: Explore the winter paradise on the sunny cross-country ski trails in Val Casies/Gsieser Tal
items.item2: Admire the glittering beauty of Lake Braies/Pragser Wildsee, Lake Dobbiaco/Toblacher See, and Lake Landro/Dürrensee with your own eyes
items.item3: Discover the secluded peace of Mt Luta/Lutterkopf on a hike and experience nature in all its unspoilt beauty

CuisinePage.heroTitle: Our gourmet hotel in South Tyrol: indulgence galore
CuisinePage.heroDescription: At our gourmet hotel in South Tyrol, passion for creative cuisine and love for our homeland fuse together to create an unrivalled culinary experience. Once you've tasted South Tyrol's mouth-watering specialities, you'll always be longing for more. The intensive aromas, tempting fragrances, and abundance of regional products that await you at the Alpen Tesitin will make every foodie's heart rejoice.

breakfast.title: Indulgent breakfast
breakfast.description:
(7.15 a.m. - 11 a.m.)

Fragrant espresso and creamy cappuccino, crispy bread from the organic bakery, fresh pastries and cakes from our patisserie, the finest ham and cheeses, as well as organic egg dishes prepared to order. Plus home-made spreads and honey from the local beekeeper, fruit juices, smoothies, and fluffy waffles. Can also be served in your room all day long (for an additional fee).

lunch.title: Lunch buffet
lunch.description:
(12.30 p.m. – 4.30 p.m.)
You have four options for lunch:

  • A hot lunch prepared in our show kitchen (12.30 p.m. – 2 p.m.)
  • Fresh salads, delicious antipasti, warming soups, and a selection of bread, cakes, and other treats from our AT patisserie (12.30 p.m. – 4.30 p.m.)
  • Delicious fruit, vegetable sticks with dips, dried fruit and nuts, as well as a variety of teas and juices from our wellness bar (from 12.30 p.m.)
  • Or, for an additional fee, an exquisite à-la-carte lunch in our restaurant (12 p.m. – 2 p.m.)

dinner.title: Gourmet dinner
dinner.description:
(6.45 p.m. – 8.45 p.m.)

A 5- to 7-course indulgent journey through the culinary variety of South Tyrol and the rest of Italy or an à-la-carte dinner? You have the freedom to choose every day. You can also regularly look forward to aperitifs, special themed evenings, tempting dessert buffets, exclusive gala dinners, and live cooking shows. We're happy to cater to your individual needs and recommend selected wines from the AT wine bunker.

item1.title: indulgent breakfast
item1.description:
A symphony of fragrant espresso and creamy cappuccino plus crispy bread from the organic bakery, honey from the beekeeper in Taisten, fluffy waffles, the finest ham, and much more besides. In summer, served on our hotel terrace.

When? 7.15 a.m. to 11 a.m. – or, for an additional fee, in your room whenever you wish

item2.title: vitality buffet
item2.description:
Enjoy our vitality buffet at the wellness bar, which awaits you with fresh fruit and vegetable sticks with dips, dried fruits and nuts, and a wide range of teas and refreshing juices.

When? From 12.30 p.m.

item3.title: à la carte
item3.description:
Enchant your senses with the exquisite à la carte dishes in our restaurant (for an additional fee), which will leave your stomach and heart wonderfully full.

When? 12 p.m. to 2 p.m.

item4.title: show cooking
item4.description:
In our show kitchen, we conjure up tasty lunch options every day that tantalise your taste buds and treat you to moments of pure indulgence.

When? 12.30 p.m. to 2 p.m.

item5.title: afternoon buffet
item5.description:
Choose from fresh salads, fine antipasti, and tasty soups as well as homemade cakes and treats from the AT patisserie.

When? 12.30 p.m. to 4.30 p.m.

item6.title: wine tasting
item6.description:
The AT wine bunker with view of the awe-inspiring mountains is an impressive setting for the twice-weekly wine tastings (for an additional fee).

When? Twice a week

item7.title: gourmet dinner
item7.description:
The highlight of the day: an exquisite 5- to 7-course gourmet menu that takes you on a culinary voyage through the aromas of South Tyrol and the rest of Italy.

When? 6.45 p.m. to 8.45 p.m.

item8.title: cheers!
item8.description:
Enjoy our selection of excellent drinks while thinking back on the day's adventures. In our bar, you'll always find the right atmosphere to make new memories.

When? During the bar's opening times

item9.title: hungry?
item9.description: Morning, afternoon, evening, or night – with our 24-hour menu, culinary delights await you at any time of the day or night.

chefSection.title: Let us introduce you our head chef Michael
chefSection.description: Our head chef along with his first-class kitchen team, tirelessly wield their wooden spoons every day and serve you traditional dishes with a pinch of international flair. Experience our creative daily menu combinations and let our gourmet hotel in South Tyrol whisk you away on a culinary voyage that will enchant your senses.

quoteSection.quote: "Fresh ingredients, honest cooking – that's my thing."

introSection.title: Cuisine at the Alpen Tesitin:
introSection.subtitle: an unforgettable experience
introSection.description: <underlineText>Our hearts</underlineText> beat for introducing you to the incomparable variety of South Tyrolean cuisine – an earnest promise that we passionately keep from sunrise to sunset at our gourmet hotel in South Tyrol.

SummerPage.heroTitle: Summer holidays in Val Pusteria/Pustertal – a dream come true
SummerPage.heroDescription: The Alpen Tesitin stands in a prime location in the "sun village" of Taisten, making it the perfect base camp for summer holidays in Val Pusteria/Pustertal. Here – surrounded by dense forests, wild meadows, and a majestic mountain panorama – you can discover the intrinsic peace of nature and effortlessly escape the daily grind. No matter whether you prefer the gentle trails through the pastures of Val Casies/Gsieser Talor the awe-inspiring peaks of the Dolomites, whether you're planning a relaxed day with your family or an action-packed adventure with friends – a world of options is available around our hotel!

weeklyProgramme.title: Weekly programme
weeklyProgramme.description: There's always something to do in Val Pusteria/Pustertal – as we locals well know. That's why it's so easy for us to create a wonderfully varied weekly programme for you that shows you all the most beautiful spots and highlights of your holiday region!

golf.title: Golf
golf.description: Perfect shots amidst dream scenery are par for the course around the Alpen Tesitin. Our favourite courses? We're more than happy to share them with you.

pustertal.title: Golf club Pustertal | Bruneck
pustertal.description: Golf Club Pustertal at the foot of Mt Plan de Corones/Kronplatz offers an extensive 9-hole course – par 33 spanning 2,690m, partly in the forest and partly in the open. The wide range of options offered by the holes and modern practice course are a real draw for beginners, seasoned golfers, and ambitious tournament challengers, as are the professional lessons and the clubhouse with restaurant, bar, and sun terrace.

mirabell.title: Golf club Mirabell | Olang
mirabell.description: Golf Club Mirabell is an excellent place for pros to train and beginners to learn the ropes. The small but excellently maintained 3-hole course with driving range features a pond and a small stream, as well as grass groomed to perfection. A real treat for your golf holiday in the Dolomites!

dolomitengolf.title: Golf club Dolomitengolf | East-Tyrol
dolomitengolf.description: 36 holes set against the skyline of the Lienz Dolomites await you at Golf Club Dolomitengolf near the sunny city of Lienz. Look forward to a fantastically tended facility set amidst unspoilt nature and featuring wetland areas, biotopes, pristine flora and fauna, and a pleasant southern climate. By the way: The Dolomitengolf Academy is one of the top professional golf schools in Austria.

cortina.title: Golfclub Cortina | Cortina d'Ampezzo
cortina.description: Historic Golfclub Cortina is located between the imposing Dolomites peaks of Mt Faloria and Mt Cristallo and offers golfers a challenging game throughout the year. Besides the 9-hole course and an indoor training facility for the winter months, you can also look forward to an elegant clubhouse that boasts a renowned gourmet restaurant.

altaBadia.title: Golfclub Alta Badia | Corvara
altaBadia.description: Par 72, 9-hole Golf Club "Tranrüs" in Alta Badia is one of the highest golf courses throughout Europe. Nestled in the majestic landscape of the Dolomites, at the foot of Mt Sassongher and the Sella Group, this course gives golfers the opportunity to improve their game amidst stunning natural scenery and relax in the Alpine clubhouse from June to October.

tennis.title: Tennis
tennis.description: With its glorious panoramas, excellently equipped tennis facilities, and qualified instructors, Alta Pusteria/Hochpustertal is an absolute paradise for tennis lovers. Rent racquets and equipment when you arrive and lose yourself in gripping outdoor or indoor matches. Who knows: Perhaps your next serve will take inspiration from Jannik Sinner, who discovered his passion for tennis here.

guestPass.title:
Included on your summer holiday in South Tyrol:
GUEST PASS
guestPass.description: Your ticket for free travel on all public transport throughout South Tyrol and participation in the varied weekly programme of the local tourist association.

WinterPage.heroTitle: Planning a winter holiday in Val Pusteria/Pustertal?
WinterPage.heroDescription: A winter holiday in Val Pusteria/Pustertal guarantees extraordinary experiences every single year. But the region really shows how beautiful it can be when a sparkling blanket of snow is draped across the land. The crystal-clear mountain air, the crunching of snow under your boots, and the majestic beauty of the snowy Dolomites creates an atmosphere that couldn't be more magical.

weeklyProgramme.title: Weekly programme
weeklyProgramme.description: There's always something to do in Val Pusteria/Pustertal – as we locals well know. That's why it's so easy for us to create a wonderfully varied weekly programme for you and your family that shows you all the most beautiful spots and highlights of your holiday region!

skiing.title: Skiing
skiing.description: A ski holiday at the Alpen Tesitin? Absolutely legendary! Just a short distance from our hotel, you'll find not only the sunny ski slopes of Mt Plan de Corones/Kronplatz, South Tyrol's no. 1 ski mountain, but also 12 interconnected ski areas and 1,200 kilometres of perfectly groomed runs that you can access with just one ski pass. And it's all thanks to Dolomiti Superski!

crossCountry.title: Cross-country skiing
crossCountry.description: Are you dreaming of gliding along stunning trails amidst unspoilt scenery? With over 1,300 kilometres of perfectly groomed routes and guaranteed snow from Christmas to March, an unrivalled cross-country skiing paradise awaits you around the Alpen Tesitin.

snowshoeing.title: Snowshoeing
snowshoeing.description: Have you always longed to explore the Dolomites with snowshoes on your feet? Blissful moments, panoramic peaks, and enchanting snowscapes await you around our hotel.

winterHiking.title: Winter hiking
winterHiking.description: Winter hiking in the Dolomites is a fantastic experience. The snow crunching underfoot, white expanses that reach as far as the eye can see, the invigorating winter air – simply divine! The best thing about spending your holiday in the Mt Plan de Corones/Kronplatz holiday region is that three magnificent mountain settings are within easy reach: Winter hiking in the Dolomites today, the Gruppo delle Vedrette di Ries-Aurina/Rieserfernergruppe tomorrow, and maybe the Deferegg Alps the day after. And a tour on the snow-bound Prato Piazza/Plätzwiese high plateau near Prags is a real must!

iceSkating.title: Ice-skating in the park
iceSkating.text: From mid-November to the end of January, Prenninger Park in Welsberg invites you to ice-skate in an enchanting setting. Rent your skates there and glide elegantly over the ice.

tobogganing.title: Fancy a little tobogganing fun?
tobogganing.text:
Malga di Tesido/Taistner Alm pasture

The family-friendly toboggan run to the catered hut on the Malga di Tesido di Fuori/Vordere Taistneralm pasture starts less than 10 minutes away from the Alpen Tesitin. Once you've arrived at the top, you can enjoy delicious South Tyrolean cuisine and a view of our local mountain, Mt Roda di Scandole/Rudlhorn.

Uwald Alm pasture (Gsies)
From the Talschluss hut in St. Magdalena, route 12 leads you up to 2,403m-high Uwald Alm pasture. Enjoy the glorious view over the valley before zooming back down to your starting point.

Mt Baranci/Haunold (Innichen)
Loved by kids and grown-ups alike: the toboggan run in the Realm of the Giant Baranci (known as Haunold in German). If you're not in the mood for skiing, grab a toboggan and whizz gleefully down the 2km-long run. The four-seater chairlift lets you reach the top of the run in comfort.

Mt Croda Rossa/Rotwand (Sexten)
With its legendary 5km descent at the heart of the Sexten Dolomites, this toboggan run promises exciting tobogganing adventures. And thanks to the cable car, you can reach the top in just 6 minutes!

guestPass.title:
Included on your winter holiday in South Tyrol:
GUEST PASS
guestPass.description: Your ticket for free travel on all public transport throughout South Tyrol and participation in the varied weekly programme of the local tourist association.

CarPage.heroTitle: Rent your sports car in the Dolomites!
CarPage.heroDescription: Do you want to rent a sports car and explore the Dolomites? Then Val Pusteria/Pustertal is the ideal starting point for your adventures. With its scenic mountain roads and the legendary Dolomites passes, the region offers a unique setting for unforgettable driving experiences. Whether you explore famous passes like Passo Giau pass, Passo Falzarego pass, or Passo Tre Croci pass, Val Pusteria/Pustertal promises incomparable driving pleasure on corner-filled roads with phenomenal panoramic views. Get ready for the adventure of a lifetime and experience the Dolomites from a whole new perspective – from behind the wheel of your dream car!

note.title: Please note:
note.text:
Car rental is only available in conjunction with a stay at the Alpen Tesitin.
The lessee must have held a valid driving licence for at least 10 years.

mercedesPorsche.title: A Mercedes-Benz or Porsche: Which takes your fancy?
mercedesPorsche.description: The legendary Porsche 911 Carrera 4 GTS (992) is the essence of performance, style, and luxury and promises a driving experience that stimulates your senses. With its elegant design and impressive power, the iconic sports car is a unique combination of aesthetics and dynamism. Its striking exterior and powerful engine make the Mercedes-Benz AMG GTC a real eye-catcher.

accordion.title: Mercedes-Benz AMG GTC & Porsche 911 Carrera 4 GTS (992)
accordion.description:
Savour the concentrated power of the Mercedes-Benz AMG GTC and Porsche 911 Carrera 4 GTS (992) as you soar elegantly around the corners while conquering the roads of Val Pusteria/Pustertal.

Required: A minimum age of 30 years and a valid driving licence held for at least 10 years.

footer.fuel: Petrol full to full (98 or 100 octane – Super Plus)

lamborghini.title: Make your dream of hiring a Lamborghini come true!
lamborghini.description: This masterpiece of engineering combines the ultimate performance with unrivalled elegance and offers you a driving experience that exceeds all your expectations. The powerful engine, aerodynamic design, and the roof that glides gently open above your head let you feel the rhythm of the road. Every corner, every moment behind the wheel of this super sports car transforms into a driving experience you'll remember for years to come. Ready to hire your Lamborghini?

accordion.title: Lamborghini Huracán EVO Spyder
accordion.description:
Experience dream days in the Dolomites with dream cabriolets.

Required: Sports-car experience, a minimum age of 40 years and a valid driving licence held for at least 10 years.

footer.fuel: Petrol full to full (100 octane – Super Plus)

MagicMoments.heroDescription: A magic moment fills your heart with joy. That's what we believe here at the <link>Alpen Tesitin </link> – and that's confirmed by all the special experiences shared by our guests and friends during their stay with us.

testimonial.message: We just want to say to you that we have spent one week in your hotel and it was one of the best places we have visited. We have already visited four Belvita hotel and yours was the best !
testimonial.compliment: The place, your staff, your SPA and your meals, all was perfect.

InfoPage.heroDescription: We invite you to find out more about the fascinating world of the Alpen Tesitin, where each detail has been lovingly designed to ensure each moment here is memorable. Admire our views, learn more about our amenities, find the answers to frequently asked questions, and discover how we turn your stay into an unforgettable experience. Welcome to the Alpen Tesitin – where dreams come true and heart-warming memories are created.

PhotosVideos.heroTitle: A symphony of natural beauty and luxury
PhotosVideos.heroDescription: A world of rugged Dolomites peaks and 5-star luxury, unforgettable experiences and the heights of indulgence – dive into our inspiring picture gallery and fall in love before you even <link>arrive.</link>

GettingHere.heroTitle: Where nature welcomes you with open arms
GettingHere.heroDescription: The journey to the Alpen Tesitin in Alta Pusteria/Hochpustertal is an awe-inspiring experience in and of itself. The majestic mountains and verdant Alpine meadows all around will awaken your longing for unforgettable adventures.
GettingHere.rentCarButton: Rent your dream car on holiday
GettingHere.mapTitle: Alpen Tesitin location on Google Maps

tips.title: Tips for reaching us
tips.description: We're happy to share our tips for enjoying a stress-free, comfortable journey to your <link>holiday paradise</link> and savouring every moment to the fullest.

car.title: Arriving by car
car.description:
Are you travelling from the north, south, or west? Follow the route over the Brenner motorway to the Brixen-Val Pusteria/Pustertal exit and then continue along the Val Pusteria/Pustertal state road for around 60 kilometres until you reach Welsberg. Turn left towards Gsies/Taisten directly after entering the village. Once you arrive in Taisten, follow the signs to the Alpen Tesitin past idyllic meadows and forests. Enjoy the one-of-a-kind views during your journey and marvel at the beauty of the surrounding nature. (Important: Selecting the "fastest route" might lead you over a somewhat uncomfortable mountain road.)

The route from the east via Lienz leads over the Austrian-Italian border. From the border, follow the state road to Welsberg and then turn right towards Gsies/Taisten. Once you arrive in Taisten, follow the signs to the Alpen Tesitin past idyllic meadows and forests. You'll be sure to fall in love with the stunning views that accompany your journey.

train.title: Arriving by train
train.description: Enjoy a relaxed journey with Italy's Trenitalia, Austria's ÖBB, Germany's DB, or South Tyrol's SAD trains to Franzensfeste. Change trains there and take the regional train to Welsberg in Val Pusteria/Pustertal. We'll be happy to pick you up at the train station free of charge. Simply call us on +39 0474 950020 to let us know your exact arrival time before you set off.

plane.title: Arriving by plane
plane.description: South Tyrolean airline SkyAlps transports you directly from the main European cities to South Tyrol's provincial capital, Bolzano. From there, you can reach our hotel quickly and easily by train, helicopter, or shuttle transfer.

helicopter.title: Helicopter transfer
helicopter.description: Luxury and comfort with a bird's eye view: Enjoy a dream flight or airport transfer by helicopter and experience an unforgettable, carefree journey. <link>Click here for further information or to send a no-obligation enquiry.</link>

shuttle.title: Shuttle transfer
shuttle.description: Do you want to be environmentally conscious and travel to South Tyrol by train or long-distance bus? The Südtirol Transfer's connection shuttle promises a stress-free journey from the train or bus station directly to the Alpen Tesitin.<link> You can enquire about it here.</link>

hero.title: Enquire now and start dreaming
hero.subtitle: Discover the luxurious world of the <bold>Alpen Tesitin</bold>. Your no-obligation enquiry opens the door to a fantastic holiday experience.

roomOptions.specificRequestSub: I wish to choose a particular room
